location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 66 of 1866 from Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay Castle to the Secretary to the Government of India in the Foreign Department, Simla

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the need to protect the telegraph station at Gwadar, the lack of available naval protection to do so and authorising Lewis Pelly to take whatever steps may be necessary to secure the relevant protection.Reply No. 31 of 1866 from Lewis Pelly can be found on the verso of folio 54
